name: Will u survive?
description:
a short survival game where the goal is to find the campfire without getting hit by the monsters or to run out of energy. Get more energy by finding cans. The more levels you complete, the higher your score. 

The game is created by 3 dutch highschool students for a school project. This is  created without any knowledge of creating code or sprites before beginning on the project

Game is still in early development.
